name: Not A Lot of... Bullets!
description:
Submission for Quarantine Jam: A lot of...

Not A Lot of... Bullets! is a turn-based duel game where both players have just one bullet.

Instructions

press the feet icon to move

press the cross-hairs to shoot and retrieve your bullet

Manage action points each turn to either move, shoot or retrieve the bullets.

Use the arena obstacles as cover to outmanoeuvre your opponents.

All assets and bugs (except the fonts) are made by me
